subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L.’s Winter Classic, which began with snow-globe quaintness on New Year’s Day in 2008, has turned into a profit center for a league that strives to be different.
snippet: The N.H.L.’s Winter Classic, which began with snow-globe quaintness on New Year’s Day in 2008, has turned into a profit center for a league that strives to be different.
